Representative animations of simulation outputs are presented here for the latest dispersal years.

**Please refer to the [Contact](contact.qmd) page for data requests.**

```{r, echo = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
## download the latest animations for each year

library(googledrive)

drive_folders <- data.frame(
  year = 2022L:2025L,
  gid = c(
    "10GuWDdWQF3kHfBsng1KmOXwJRe4HabpP", ## 2022 dispersal
    "15spzG5bbpkY9-B007ZsKr4diV7qDunhJ", ## 2023 dispersal
    "133JchsL6xMWxf_XlmvVspxtXd1UZHOeu", ## 2024 dispersal
    "1-Pyilgyql4Gg726Mh2yur3b4NqfHctON"  ## 2025 dispersal
  )
)

purrr::walk2(
  .x = drive_folders$gid,
  .y = drive_folders$year,
  .f = function(gid, year) {
    foo <- drive_get(id = as_id(gid)) ## works...
    
    ## TODO: Error: Shared drive not found: 0AC0WNQwJG4HCUk9PVA -- app permissions issue?
    foo$drive_resource[[1]]$isAppAuthorized ## FALSE
    
    # gifs <- drive_ls(path = as_id(gid), pattern = "[.]gif$")
    ## TODO
  }
)
```
